registry.title: iana-ipv6-ext-types YANG Module
registry.registration_rule: See IPv6 Extension Header Types registry.
registry.description:
New values must not be directly added to the iana-ipv6-ext-types YANG module. They must instead be added to the IPv6 Extension Header Types registry.
Module: iana-ipv6-ext-types@2025-12-22.yang
